data.message:
I'm so glad we don't political hate in Australia like you guys do. 
You guys could dish our leader & 99% of Australians would agree with you and the 1% would just have a stupid argument that at least we don't have trump as our president. Which is exactly that a stupid argument.
You support your leader regardless if you like them or not it's your president. 

Eminem is just stirring controversy & making money off all the hate you guys give him.
